Blog.post: That there That's not me I go Where I please I walk through walls I float down the Liffey I'm not here This isn't happening I'm not here I'm not here In a little while I'll be gone The moment's already passed Yeah it's gone And I'm not here This isn't happeningI'm not here I'm not here Strobe lights and blown speakers Fireworks and hurricanes I'm not here This isn't happening I'm not here I'm not here Hot snakes- " XoX"

I quit my job last night. Me and my boss got into a confrontation and i walked out. This way I will be able to hang out with my friends more before I move. Tonight I am going to Michael's funeraul bless his soul. I dont have much to say right now. I am tired. I am always tired. Thursday we have a show at Ashley's (corns) house which should be fun. Rock and Roll bitches. The Paper Chase- "subject two"

The show on Saturday was just amazing. I am so happy with the way everything turned out. Last night kind of sucked though. I think I had the flu and I was not a very big fan of it but im feeling ok now. I have to be at work in a half an hour we will see what happens. Im starting to pack my room to get ready for the move. It sucks but I will roll with it. I met some pretty cool people from South West so hopefully I will be able to hang out with some of them at school. I work 9 hours today. That just put me in a bad mood. I am all dried up. Call Me Lightning- "Ghouls"

This title means something. I worked today. Im sure Ill work again. We have a show tonight. Saturday July 24, 2004 (FFR CD RELEASE SHOW) Ryan's Ballroom in Combined Locks, WI w/ Call Me Lightning, Sunday Flood, Temper Temper, The Red Scare $5.00 / 7:00 PM (M/I/C/H/A/E/L) RadioHead- "Lucky"

I woke up today more awake then I have been for months and I must say I enjoy it. As much as I love being sleep deprived. Tonight we have a show, here are the deatils. *Friday July 23, 2004 Eagles Club in Green Bay, WI (1035 VANDERBRAAK ST.)w/ Patterns In Static (formerly One Step Behind), Parking Lot Showdown, and Mondays Over. If this is your cup of tea come check it out otherwise check out tomorrow's show! urlLink www.FaceForRadio.org Thats all i have to say. oh yeah i dont work today. Bob Dylan- "Times are a changing"

Last night I went to Isaac's house where I got to hang out with Fat Hoods. We also had band last night, it was amazing we wrote some hot stuff. There were a lot of people at Isaac's it was good to see some of them again. Sleep is amazing. Sleep is amazing. Two more nights until the show, I am having anxiety attacks waiting for this damn thing. It will be a great time. I have work 4:30 - 9 and i really dont mind, thats a good feeling. Thats all i have, thats the done of me. The White Stripes - "I Just dont know what to do with myself"

I am so damn tired right now. I had work at 12 and oddly enough thats what time i woke up. My head is killing me and my allergies arent that great either. Fat Hoods is back, cant wait to see him tonight. It should be pretty damn rock n roll. 3 days until the big show, i cant wait for it. I m putting in my 2 weeks notice soon. On the 4th of August I am on my way to Arizona until the 27th. Then when I come back we will already be living in Green Bay. I will be going to Green Bay SouthWest next year. Im guesing it will suck but I have to get my grades up anyways. I wish I would have bought Battles' CD. They were fucking amazing. Some girl at work was trying to tell me that Fuel is the greatest rock band ever. What a joker, i wonder how bad the rest of her life sucks if thats just her opinion on music. I have to get back to work, I have ten dollars to my name and i dont ger paid for another week. I Love life. The Icarus Line- "On the Lash"

Today I am making this online blog due to the fact that I have nothing to do at work. I have been working too much lately. Tonight I am going home watching Donnie Darko and then going to bed. I am excited for the show on the 24th the CD turned out awesome. I am very satisfied with the way things are going right now. I dont have to work tomorrow so thats a plus, I am spending the day with Sara Hopkins, one year ago we started going out. I am moving to Green Bay in August. I am also going to Arizona. All is well. The Pixies - "Gigantic"
